summary: A teenage American girl while visiting her father, is thrown into London society during the "Debutante Season".
cast: Rex Harrison|Kay Kendall|John Saxon|Sandra Dee|Angela Lansbury|Peter Myers|Diane Clare|Rene Aranda|Georges Billy|Jean-Paul Blonday|Charles Cullum|Henri Guégan|Charles Herbert|Roger LaVern|Ambrosine Phillpotts|Sheila Raynor|Michel Thomas|Pierre Vaudier
title: Mamá nos complica la vida
